DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate naltrexone cognitive-behavioral therapy treatment alcohol dependence post-traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) . Subjects randomly assign 6-month treatment either : 1 ) naltrexone alone , 2 ) naltrexone PTSD psychosocial therapy , 3 ) placebo PTSD psychosocial therapy , 4 ) placebo alone . An enhanced medication management intervention accompany treatment condition . Follow-up assessment complete 9 12 month treatment .
